altIdentifier.idno: Le Strange Cat. 3. Not in Morley's handwritten catalogue.

msItem.title: ʻAjāʼib al-Ṭabaqāt
عجائب الطبقات
msItem.note: Folio one, verso: Account of the cities and countries of Khorasan - Mawara oul nahr etc. Purchased at Bochara Bochara 20 July 1832 Alex Burnes Marginal notes in English Last folio, verso: This Book was presented to the R.A. Society of London by the Traveller Burnes. The Wonders of the Universe. Headings and punctuation in red.

listBibl.bibl: Storey, ii, pp. 138-9. (None in Rieu or Ethe).

'Ms English translation, Sir A. Purves.' So Codrington/Reade, but this is based on a pencilled note on the Library copy of Codrington and the name is to be read Sir A. Burnes. The translation is presumably in the Library.

bindingDesc.p: Green and red leather binding, evidently Bukharan, with simple blind-tooling and brown stamped cartouches, the four smaller ones inscribed with the name of the binder: 'amal-i Mulla Qalandar Juybari. The doublures have an arrangement of marginal and central cartouches stamped on paper, the central ones from the same stamps as on the outer side of the covers.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
